attributes.action: Bring in a government reuglautor to oversee Residential Managing Agents
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently if you live in a Leasehold property, you have to pay service charges to a managing agent in order that they look after the communal areas of your building.  

These companies take large sums of money from their customers and frequently provide incredibly poor levels of service safe in the knowledge that it is currently very difficult to successfully complain and recover any service charges from these companies.  It is even more difficult to have these companies replaced and residents have no choice in who is appointed to look after their building.

A Number of these companies have recently featured on BBC Watchdog where a representative from their own voluntary regulator, ARMA stated that this industry required government regulation.
